list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor project structure for webpack and express integration
This commit does several changes related to the webpack and express setup. It updates `package.json` to include new dependencies such as express and webpack-dev-server. It also modifies several configuration files (`vite.config.js`, `webpack.config.js`) to properly configure the build process. The location of several files, such as `index.html` and `App.jsx`, is also rearranged to streamline the project structure. Additionally, a new `server.js` file is added for the express server configuration.

task.summary:
Update ESLint configuration and ESLint-related dependencies in React App
Modified the ESLint configuration file in the React App. The changes include updating and adding more specific rules, adding some parserOptions and plugins. Updates have also been made to the ESLint-related dependencies in the package.json and package-lock.json files. Miscellaneous updates have been done in the .idea/workspace.xml file and small changes in components in the application.

Integrate eslint-config-prettier into project config files
Integrates 'eslint-config-prettier' plugin in 'vite.config.js' and updates ESLint configuration in '.eslintrc.cjs'. Additionally, adds 'eslint-config-prettier' and 'prettier' to package dependencies. Also, includes semi-colons for better code readability across several files and creates '.prettyignore'.
Added Babel Added webpack deleted redundant files Added more dependencies to set up dev environment

Reconfigure scripts and change components for webpack setup
Readjusts the scripts in package.json to allow webpack operations. Adjustment of the script source link in the index.html file.
